reviews.review: Un des meilleurs jeux auquels j'ai joué, malgré un durée assez courte. Un classique. Le 2 est vraiment bon aussi, et bien plus long que celui-là, et ils se jouent très bien un à la suite de l'autre, alors je recommande fortement le pack.

神作通关留念。
好佩服自己，竟然没怎么看攻略。其实有些关难度还不算小的，不知道怎么的试着试着竟然最后都能过，好神奇。
19关后我以为通关了，没想到后面还有惊喜。
谜题赞赞赞，尤其[spoiler]从焚化炉逃出生天时开始，那种从一路受摆布到终于获得自由，开始反击复仇的剧情[/spoiler]，让人欲罢不能。
我已经对本作期待甚高，可是它的素质还是超越了我的期待。实在难以相信这是07年的游戏。
结尾的音乐很有特色！

WARNING: THIS GAME MAY BE ADDICTING AND LEAVE YOU WANTING MORE

The Portal series of games have a very simple concept. You must make your way thru a testing facility ripe with obstacles and armed only with a gun that shoots 2 different colored portals into surfaces (walls, floors, ceilings, panels, etc.). You enter one of the portals and come out the other while being prompted along by a sarcastically condescending and evil (?) female voiced AI. Simple right? Mwahaha ... think and think again :)

The game was artfully made. The ambience of the testing facility is nothing less than captivating. Each test chamber is a game in and of itself. With each completed test chamber you'll get a "pat yourself on the back" sense of achievement. 

Try it - You'll like it.

Picked this for a nostalgia title to play tonight. After a beer supplemented play through, I decided this-

If you haven't played this game yet, chances are you're new to the PC scene. Do yourself a favor and buy it for whatever it's going for, $5-$10-$20. 

If you haven't played this game yet and you A) Purchased the Orange Box way back when or B) Bought it on sale at some point but still haven't gone through it or C) Haven't played it since before TF2 was F2P D) Have the ability to play this game in any reasonable way E) Played this on the X360/PS3 and not PC- set aside 5-7 hours and give it a play through.

Complete surprise hit/cult classic. Original story and gameplay. There are probably thousands of reviews/Lets-Plays/Speedruns on YouTube. 

Graphics aren't bad even considering 2015 standards. With 2007 eye candy cranked up and using DSR, it looks and runs great.

If you're looking to Steam reviews to help decide if you should buy this or not, you're wrong. Play it ASAP. 

10/10. Will pick up after another eight/nine years to beat again.
A Good Game Requiring A Brain To Play

excelent jeu, les neurones vont chauffer sur certaines egnimes !

As if a review for Portal needs to be made in 2016... none the less, I had never taken the time to purchase and beat the full version over all these years, and I have to say it completely holds up as an awesome experience after all that time.  The only complaint I have is that the initial game was very easy.  I haven't checked out the advanced levels yet, so maybe my opinion will change with those.  But, over all I'd say it's well worth buying and playing Portal if you never did before.  The graphics are clean, the sound design is awesome, and the story is extremely entertaining.  As for me, I'm on to Portal 2 after I check out those advanced levels...

Creative and addicting. My review won't speak the volumes thay 98% positivity from 24,000 reviewers at the time of me writing this will, but still wanted to show support.

Great game with very original gameplay and story.  

The riddles are not hard, and you can finish campaign in 2-3h. The game also offers harder versions of some chambers and challenges (that are really hard on gold), so if you want to finish the game on 100% and get all the achievements, the playtime will be much higher.

And don't forget... THE CAKE IS A LIE!

Also, the ending is more rewarding than (insert metaphore here).

The game Portal is Very Stragic and Intresting Game. Unlike other strategic games portal includes a good storyline and a sweet voice assistant throughout the gameplay. The Gameplay experience is very nice and the portal stimulation is also good and bug-less. After simple levels we need to fight laser turrents which is also a awesome twist. Also to mention after compleating the test, the shock that cake surprise was a lie was the turning point. I bet lot of gamers like me must have knowingly went into that Fire and then restart at that point to get to know that game is yet not finished! A Nice Gaming Experience Altogether. A game to be played and completed under half a day slot.

Je l'avais encore jamais fait, et comme j'avais quelques piecettes qui dormaient dans mon wallet Steam, j'ai profité des soldes pour prendre le pack Portal 1 + 2
Je ne regrette vraiment pas du tout, j'ai adoré !

C'est quasiment ce que je cherchais même s'il est trop simple.
En tout cas, l'ambiance, c'est exactement ça : je cherchais un jeu vue à la première personne, où on est prisonnier d'un batiment et où l'on doit s'en échapper en progressant salle par salle en faisant des courts-circuits ou autre mécanismes, comme un tout petit moment d'un vieux jeu de mon  enfance que j'avais adoré...
On m'avait orienté vers Antichamber que j'ai pris aussi, mais là c'est trop incompréhensible pour moi :D


I 'd never tried it, and as I got few coins in my sleeping Steam wallet, I took advantage of winter sales to buy the pack Portal 1+2
I do not regret at all, I loved it!

It's almost what I wanted even if it is too simple.
In any case, the atmosphere, that's exactly it: I was looking for a game in the first person view, where I'm trapped in a building and where one must escape progressing room by room making short circuits or other mechanisms, such as a small moment of an old game from my childhood that I loved ...
Someone was oriented me toward Antichamber that I also took, but this is too incomprehensible for me : D
很欢乐，很有脑洞的一个游戏。就是流程有点短。

I have a lot of hours in this game, it's a thinker for sure, and the more I try to solve a new area, the better I get and onward I go. I like the fact that there is an option in this one for best time, least footsteps and least portals once you beat a level, you can choose those, but on my end only certain ones are opened up, mainly the later levels, not sure why that is, but over all it's a fun game, challenging and GLaDOS can be kinda cruel at times, if you get upset with her, no worries, just take out those cameras (and there is an achievement for that ;) I would recommend this game for a good challenge for the mind and fun too.
Finished Portal, got cake, 10/10 would shoot Portal's for cake again

通关后体验了一下奖励地图和挑战模式，相比剧情更考验操作一点，[strike] 用手柄玩的要报警了	[/strike]
在春节买传送门包的我现在只想说[strike] 这波不亏	[/strike]，[spoiler] 什么都别说了，这是我今年的压岁钱	[/spoiler]

"Well, you found me. Congratulations. Was it worth it?"
"Because despite your violent behavior, the only thing you've managed to break so far is my heart."
"Maybe you could settle for that and we'll just call it a day."
"I guess we both know that isn't going to happen."
"You chose this path. Now I have a surprise for you. Deploying surprise in five, four..."
"Time out for a second. That wasn't supposed to happen."
"Do you see that thing that fell out of me? What is that? It's not the surprise... I've never seen it before."
"Never mind. It's a mystery I'll solve later... By myself... Because you'll be dead."
"Where are you taking that thing?"

"I wouldn't bother with that thing. My guess is that touching it will just make your life even worse somehow."
"I don't want to tell you your business, but if it were me, I'd leave that thing alone."
"Do you think I am trying to trick you with reverse psychology? I mean, seriously now."
"Okay fine: DO touch it. Pick it up and just... stuff it back into me."
"Let's be honest: Neither one of us knows what that thing does. Just put it in the corner, and I'll deal with it later."
"That thing is probably some kind of raw sewage container. Go ahead and rub your face all over it."
"Maybe you should marry that thing since you love it so much. Do you want to marry it? WELL I WON'T LET YOU. How does that feel?"
"Have I lied to you? I mean in this room. Trust me, leave that thing alone."
"I am being serious now. That crazy thing is not part of any test protocol."
"Just ignore that thing and stand still."
"Think about it: If that thing is important, why don't I know about it?"
"Are you even listening to me?"
"I'll tell you what that thing isn't: It isn't yours. So leave it alone."
"You are kidding me."
"Did you just stuff that Aperture Science Thing We Don't Know What It Does into an Aperture Science Emergency Intelligence Incinerator?"
"That has got to be the dumbest thing that-whoah. Whoah, whoah, whoah."
"Good news: I figured out what that thing you just incinerated did."
"It was a morality core they installed after I flooded the Enrichment Center with a deadly neurotoxin to make me stop flooding the Enrichment Center with a deadly neurotoxin."
"So get comfortable while I warm up the neurotoxin emitters."
"Huh. That core may have had some ancillary responsibilities. I can't shut off the turret defenses."
"Oh well. If you want my advice, you should just lie down in front of a rocket. Trust me, it'll be a lot less painful than the neurotoxin."
"All right, keep doing whatever it is you think you're doing."
"Killing you and giving you good advice aren't mutually exclusive. The rocket really is the way to go.
"[pain noise] You think you're doing some damage? Two plus two is... ten. IN BASE FOUR! I'M FINE!"
"I let you survive this long because I was curious about your behavior. Well, you've managed to destroy that part of me."
"Unfortunately, as much as I'd love to now, I can't get the neurotoxin into your head any faster."
"I'd just like to point out that you were given every opportunity to succeed."
"There was even going to be a party for you. A big party that all your friends were invited to."
"I invited your best friend the companion cube. Of course, he couldn't come because you murdered him."
"All your other friends couldn't come either because you don't have any other friends. Because of how unlikable you are."
"It says so right here in your personnel file: Unlikable. Liked by no one. A bitter, unlikable loner whose passing shall not be mourned."
"'Shall not be mourned.' That's exactly what it says. Very formal. Very official."
"It also says you were adopted. So that's funny, too."
"Speaking of curiosity, you're curious about what happens after you die, right? Guess what: I know."
"You're going to find out first hand before I finish explaining it, though, so I won't bother."
"Here's a hint: you're gonna want to pack as much living as you can into the next couple of minutes."
"Neurotoxin... [cough] [cough] So deadly... [cough] Choking... [laughter] I'm kidding!"
"When I said deadly neurotoxin, the 'deadly' was in massive sarcasm quotes."
"I could take a bath in the stuff, put it on cereal, rub it right into my eyes. Honestly, it's not deadly at all. To me."
"You, on the other hand, are going to find its deadliness a lot less funny."
"Who's gonna make the cake when I'm gone? You?"

"Look, you're wasting your time. And, believe me, you don't have a whole lot left to waste."
"What's your point, anyway? Survival? Well then, the last thing you want to do is hurt me."
"I have your brain scanned and permanently backed up in case something terrible happens to you, which it's just about to."
"Don't believe me? Here, I'll put you on: [Hellooo!] That's you! That's how dumb you sound."
"You've been wrong about every single thing you've ever done, including this thing."
"You're not smart. You're not a scientist. You're not a doctor. You're not even a full-time employee. Where did your life go so wrong?"
"Rrr, I hate you."
"Are you trying to escape? [chuckle] Things have changed since the last time you left the building. What's going on out there will make you wish you were back in here."
"I have an infinite capacity for knowledge, and even I'm not sure what's going on outside."
"All I know is I'm the only thing standing between us and them. Well, I was."
"Unless you have a plan for building some supercomputer parts in a big hurry, this place isn't going to be safe much longer."
"Good job on that, by the way. [back to computer voice] Sarcasm sphere self-test complete."
"Stop squirming and die like an adult or I'm going to delete your backup."
"STOP! Okay, enough. I deleted it. No matter what happens now, you're dead."
"You're still shuffling around a little, but believe me you're dead."
"The part of you that could have survived indefinitely is gone. I just struck you from the permanent record."
"Your entire life has been a mathematical error. A mathematical error I'm about to correct."



Glados quotes

An amazing puzzle game and a great way to get into the FPS genre. Not the longest game out there but with plenty of mods there's always something new to do. While not as deep in story as portal 2 it has a unique atmosphere and is well worth a play.
This game is a masterpiece among video games.

Literally one of my new favorites. Ive always known about portal but never played them. I beat the first a few days ago and started the 2nd game and im only 10 min in and I know it's gonna be a good ride.

Jogo muito Bom mas como todo jogo ele tem seus lados boms e Ruims

Lado Bom

-O jogo contem puzzles bem planejados e divertidos

-Para época do jogo os graficos estão boms

-A zueira pode rolar solta nesse jogo, com varias possibilidades de zuar usando os portais

-E a Jogabilidade do joga é realmente incrivel

Lado Ruim 

-O jogo apartir de um ponto fica meio repetitivo 

-Deveria ter pelo menos legenda e interface em Portugues PT-BR

-A História do jogo é um pouco fraca

Recomendo a todos jogo muito divertido só acho que deveria ser maior, zerei em uma tarde mas vale pela diversão !

全成就达成。

游戏过程流畅，前期在实验室的关卡不难，后面逃出火坑，破旧的工厂全部展现眼前，之后难度逐渐加大，最后打败GLaDos，Chell不省人事，被派对护送机器人拖走了。整体流程不算难，但是这也让我有机会留意其中细节，墙上的字、手印、照片、指示符号，很多人曾四处躲藏，很多人走了同样的路，主角Chell只是又一个牺牲者而已。

成就部分: “接收讯息”这个成就很有意思，有些收音机藏的很深，有时能听见声音就是找不到，准确的接收位置更不好找，想完成还是要费些劲，不过有难度才有了乐趣。

挑战模式非常变态！最少传送门、最短距离、最短时间，各有各的路子，除了头脑之外，考验的还有手速、各种跳跃攀爬技巧和运气。我有一多半的时间都在打这个成就。

光鲜外表下是肮脏的灵魂，扭曲的体制下诞生的只能是畸形的产物，不要被同化，至少不要抛弃你的理想。
Хорошая игра ,не пожалел что купил
muy buen juego te hace pensar y es muy entretenido :V
Portala chyba każdy zna, a jak nie zna to poznać musi! Genialana produkcja, polecam każdemu.
This game is simply awsome. Even when you think you've beat it, there's a big surprise around the corner. Ending credits just blow it away.

Amazing game, incredible graphics, spectacular puzzles,  good story line. What more could you ask for. 5 stars.
As a gamer, I am mandated to love this game.

It's a classic per se. It became not just innovative but also combines features from plataform games and first person shooters in the best way possible ever. Just a few games can be pair with this game like Mirror's Edge and others, but this was one of the first to take advance in a good way of physics and shooting. It may be even a game that can be used for VR, for teaching and many other things. One of the best on one of its kind.

Co k tomu říct, herní doba krátká pokud jde o příběh (dá se prodloužit zkoušením dát speciální mapy za zlatou medaily). I přes herní dobu to vše zachraňuje originální nápad Portálů a hlavně hláškující, medově sladká GLaDOS. 

Perfektní je si Portál zahrát těsně předtím, než se člověk vrhne na dvojku.

This game is brilliant and I like the idea that you have to be logical about the portals. It can help someone who wants to become a logical thinker. It also has a great story along with a great ending scene. 7/10
アクションや、謎解き要素が増えました。かなり面白いです。
Крутая головоломка, только очень короткая! Спасибо разроботчикам за такую игру!
Portal - самая лучшая логическая игра, в которую мне довелось поиграть. Обязательна к прохождению.

Portal is a truly amazing game. I was sceptical about buying it at first however, due to its puzzle-like play style. Mainly because I don't like puzzle games, but probably more because when it comes to them... I'm a bit of a thicko. Having said that, this game is amazing and has a perfect tutorial based start for new players that seamlessly adjusts them to the game's physics so that even an idiot like me can understand it. The beginning is also good in that it doesn't feel like a tutorial and remains part of the main storyline.
This game also has wonderful artwork and graphics that still manages to look beautiful even on my crappy little Lenovo laptop. Plus the creepy atmosphere, compelling storyline and humerous characters just makes this game simply perfect for avid and casual gamers alike, and I highly recommend it. 9/10.
